name: Bonk it!
description:
...is a 3D co-op game with puzzle and jump ‘n’ run parts, designed for two players. Each player has one unique tool with numerous abilities. The hammer-player can clear the way, while the grapple-player can get to places that are otherwise beyond reach. Only through teamwork and communication can you arrive at a spaceship, to save the world from a devastating fate.

Get ready for a bonking adventure…

Controls: General/both players:

Movement: Left Controller

Camera Look: Right Controller

Jump: A or Right Controller pressed down

Interact (Pick up Cubes/ Use Buttons):  X

Hammer abilities:

Use hammer (& shoot cubes when cube is picked up): LB

Grappling gun abilities:

Use grappling gun: LB

Cancel grappling gun: RB
